content: For Newton, as for Boyle and Descartes, there were laws of nature only because there had been a (Divine) Legislator.
translations: ita:Per Newton, come per Boyle e Cartesio, c'erano leggi di natura solo perch√© c'era stato un Legislatore (Divino)
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
